title: Arcade Event
body: I have a problem with the new arcade missions. The first reward you get in the arcade event is the arcade icon. To complete the next missions you have to equip the Arcade icon. The problem is, I completed the first mission, however I did not receive the icon which leads to me not being able to complete any of the next missions. Please help. I can provide screenshots if needed

replies.body: Turns out those icons were delayed a bit in when they were sent out, but it does look like yours finally showed up! Let me know if you still don't see if and I can take a look for you ^_^!
Same to me and alot players, Riot fix please!
